name: Blissful Spell
text: The absolute peace of Nirvana infuses your spells, giving pause to foes and granting boldness to allies.
benefit:
You can alter any spell that targets a single creature to become a blissful spell, although the exact effects of the metamagic vary depending on whether the spell is beneficial or offensive. A creature successfully hit by an offensive blissful spell (if the spell requires an attack roll) or that fails its saving throw against an offensive blissful spell takes a –2 penalty on attack rolls and weapon damage rolls for 1 round. A beneficial blissful spell instead grants affected creatures a +2 morale bonus on skill checks and saving throws for 1 round in addition to its normal effects. A blissful spell gains the good descriptor, and the additional effect is a mind-affecting compulsion effect.

A blissful spell uses a spell slot 1 level higher than the spell’s normal spell level. Spells with the evil descriptor can’t be blissful spells.
text_zh: 来自涅槃境的纯粹的平和注入了你的法术，阻碍你的敌人或是为你的盟友带来勇毅。
benefit_zh:
你调整选择任何一个以单一生物为目标的法术使其成为福佑法术，超魔的实际效果会根据法术是增益还是有害发生变化。一个被攻击性福佑法术命中（若法术需要攻击检定）或是对抗攻击性的福佑法术豁免失败的生物在1轮内命中骰与武器伤害骰受到-2的罚值。而一个增益性的福佑法术除了其本身效果外，还会在一轮内使目标在技能检定与豁免检定上获得+2的士气加值。一个福佑法术获得[善良]描述符，其效果是一个[影响心灵]的效果。

福佑法术使用高于原本法术环级1级的法术位。具有[邪恶]描述符的法术无法成为福佑法术调整的目标。
